title: Best of The Herd: 10/25/2019
itunes:title: Best of The Herd: 10/25/2019
description:
Colin says the Rockets are going to have a lot of problems this season and you already started seeing it in their first game with Westbrook and Harden. Colin can't get over the Eagles no matter how many times they let him down. He questions why the Browns just can't seem to stop making noise each week. Plus, Orlando Scandrick was cut by the Eagles on Monday and he comes in studio to talk about what is wrong with Philadelphia, he responds to Malcolm Jenkins taking shots and him and why he considered it a mistake to ever leave the Cowboys

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
Colin says the Rockets are going to have a lot of problems this season and you already started seeing it in their first game with Westbrook and Harden. Colin can't get over the Eagles no matter how many times they let him down. He questions why the Browns just can't seem to stop making noise each week. Plus, Orlando Scandrick was cut by the Eagles on Monday and he comes in studio to talk about what is wrong with Philadelphia, he responds to Malcolm Jenkins taking shots and him and why he considered it a mistake to ever leave the Cowboys
